room_title: Escape room "Blacksite" by Escape the Place in Colorado Springs
review: We did a room for my husband's surprise birthday party and it was a huge hit. All of the adults and teenagers loved it. We did Blacksite. It is definitely something that makes you think and work together as a group. The staff was amazing and we fell in love with the concept and will definitely be back. I am so glad they finally have something fun for adults and teenagers to do together as a group. Amazing!

room_title: Escape room "Blacksite" by Escape the Place in Colorado Springs
review: Went there for my birthday and had the best time ever and we are definitely going back again. This place is amazing and I would recommend it for a good time.

room_title: Escape room "Blacksite" by Escape the Place in Colorado Springs
review: Thanks for a fun date night! We will be back and determined to make it out next time!
